strings.browse_no_paths_overlay_error_message:
you have not configured any metadata paths.

you must add at least one path in the settings screen before you can browse by directory.
strings.browse_no_subdirectories_toast:
there are no more sub-directories.

press '%s' to play the selection.
strings.hotkeys_reset_all_message:
are you sure you want to reset all hotkeys to their default bindings?

existing custom bindings will be forgotten!
strings.hotkeys_conflict_message:
the hotkey '{{hotkey}}' *may* conflict with '{{existing}}', depending on context.

are you sure you want to assign this binding?
strings.hotkeys_backup_success_message:
key bindings were backed up to the following location:

{{path}}
strings.hotkeys_backup_failure_message:
backup was *NOT* successful! please make sure you have write permission to the following directory:

{{path}}
strings.hotkeys_delete_binding_message: would you like to reset the key binding for '{{key}}' to its default '{{default}}'?
strings.settings_first_run_dialog_body:
add some directories that contain music files, then press '%s' to show the library view and start listening!

for troubleshooting, press '%s' to enter the console view.

other keyboard shortcuts are displayed in the command bar at the bottom of the screen. toggle command mode by pressing 'ESC'.

select 'ok' to get started.
strings.settings_needs_restart: you will need to restart musikcube for this change to take effect.
strings.settings_last_fm_dialog_message_unregist:
no last.fm account registered.

press ENTER to begin the linking process.
strings.settings_last_fm_dialog_message_obtainin: contacting last.fm for an account link token...
strings.settings_last_fm_dialog_message_waiting_:
press 'o' to open the account link page in your default browser, or manually navigate to the following url:

{{link}}

after granting permission, press 'ENTER' to continue.

(note: you may be asked to sign into your last.fm account.)
strings.settings_last_fm_dialog_message_register: getting a session token, please wait...

registered with account: '{{username}}'

go listen to some music!
strings.settings_last_fm_dialog_message_link_err:
failed to get an account link token from last.fm.

please try again later.
strings.settings_last_fm_dialog_message_register:
failed link your last.fm account.

please make sure you open the following url and grant permission:

{{link}}

press ENTER to try again.
strings.settings_server_invalid_settings_message: invalid or missing settings. please check the values and try again.
strings.settings_preamp_invalid_gain_message: preamp gain values must be between -20.0 and 20.0 dB
strings.settings_no_plugin_config_message: plugin "{{name}}" does not provide any configurable settings.
strings.validator_dialog_number_parse_bounded_er: please enter a number between {{minimum}} and {{maximum}} to continue.
strings.validator_dialog_number_parse_error: please enter a number to continue.
strings.color_theme_256_overlay_message:
disabling 256 color degradation will enable RGB color mode, which will replace colors in the stock palette. disabling this option results in higher fidelity themes, but it may cause display issues in other applications until the terminal is reset.

are you sure you want to disable 256 color degradation?
strings.playback_overlay_invalid_transport: the selected output driver (%s) doesn't support crossfading.
strings.playqueue_overlay_confirm_overwrite_mess: are you sure you want to overwrite the playlist '%s'?
strings.playqueue_overlay_confirm_delete_message: are you sure you want to delete '%s'?
strings.playqueue_overlay_load_playlists_none_me: you haven't saved any playlists yet!
strings.playqueue_overlay_add_to_start_of_queue: add to beginning of play queue
strings.playqueue_overlay_add_to_end_in_queue: add to end of play queue
strings.playqueue_overlay_add_as_next_in_queue: add as next in play queue
strings.tracklist_hot_swap_success_toast: play queue hot-swapped with current list
strings.lyrics_not_playing: can't show lyrics because nothing is playing!
strings.lyrics_lookup_failed: lyrics lookup failed. press '%s' to retry.
strings.update_check_dialog_message:
musikcube version %s is now available for download. a changelog and binaries are available at:

%s
strings.update_check_no_updates_message: no updates found at this time.
